titles.title: To impose sanctions with respect to Iranian financial institutions and the development and use of Iranian digital currency, and for other purposes.
Blocking Iran Illicit Finance Act
Blocking Iran Illicit Finance Act
Blocking Iran Illicit Finance Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, the Judiciary, Ways and Means, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
